metadata.title: CVE-2024-26971 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: clk:qcom: gcc-ipq5018: fix terminating of frequency table arrays The frequencytable arrays are supposed to be terminated with an empty element. Add suchentry to the end of the arrays where it is missing in order to avoidpossible out-of-bound access when the table is traversed by functions likeqcom_find_freq() or qcom_find_freq_floor().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
